nodes.text: Rhigar 1 was a forest moon orbiting a planet in the Rata Nebula controlled by the Chiss, the site of the military academy attended by Jag Fel, his brother Davin, and Shawnkyr Nuruodo. The forest moon was the innermost of the planet's three major satellites, along with Asdroni and Rhigar 3.

The name of Rhigar 1 is inferred from the name of the ocean moon Rhigar 3, given in the novel The New Jedi Order: Dark Journey. The name Rhigar has been inferred for the academy world itself. The name of the planet was later confirmed in The Essential Atlas.
